name: Bright & Cozy | 1 min to Subway + 12 min Downtown
neighborhood_overview: 1 min walk to MBTA TRANSIT, Boston Blue Bikes(seasonal) lots of bakeries restaurants. 12 mins from SouthBay shopping center, movie theater and minutes drive or commute to downtown Boston
description:
Quiet, cozy and comfy. Beautifully decorated room with Plenty of space.

The space
The unit is very large with 4 bedrooms in total. Access a fully stocked kitchen (shared) with everything you will need. 2 very large shared bathrooms, shared living room and WiFi ready.

Guest access
WiFi, outdoor space for sitting(seasonal) kitchen and living room

Other things to note
ON street Parking is LIMITED if you DRIVE private parking may be an additional $10 a day so please reserve during busy season.

License number
STR-413706
